info.title: TEC Zapier REST API
info.description: TEC Zapier REST API allows direct connections to making Zapier Zaps.

200.description: Returns the documentation for TEC REST API in Swagger consumable format.

parameters.description: The consumer id to authorize Zapier connection.
parameters.name: consumer_id

parameters.description: The consumer secret to authorize Zapier connection.
parameters.name: consumer_secret

parameters.description: The app name of the Zapier connection.
parameters.name: app_name

400.description: A required authentication parameter is missing or an input parameter is in the wrong format

parameters.description: The access token to authorize Zapier connection.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: The access token to authorize Zapier connection.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: The archive page to return
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The number of events to return on each page
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Events that start on the specified date
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: Events that end on the specified date
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: Events that start before the specified date
parameters.name: starts_before

parameters.description: Events that start after the specified date
parameters.name: starts_after

parameters.description: Events that end before the specified date
parameters.name: ends_before

parameters.description: Events that end after the specified date
parameters.name: ends_after

parameters.description: Dates set using the start_date/end_date, starts_*/ends_* are set to start at the specified times. The default behavior is to include the entire days.
parameters.name: strict_dates

parameters.description: Events should contain the specified string in the title or description
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified categories slugs or IDs
parameters.name: categories

parameters.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified tags slugs or IDs
parameters.name: tags

parameters.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified venue IDs
parameters.name: venue

parameters.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified organizer IDs
parameters.name: organizer

parameters.description: Events should be filtered by their featured status
parameters.name: featured

parameters.description: The event post status
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Requires Events Calendar Pro. Events should be filtered by whether their venue has geolocation data
parameters.name: geoloc

parameters.description: Requires Events Calendar Pro. Events should be filtered by their venue latitude location, must also provide geoloc_lng
parameters.name: geoloc_lat

parameters.description: Requires Events Calendar Pro. Events should be filtered by their venue longitude location, must also provide geoloc_lat
parameters.name: geoloc_lng

parameters.description: Include events with one of the post IDs specified in the array of CSV list, date filters will be ignored.
parameters.name: include

parameters.description: Events should be filtered by their post_parent being the specified one.
parameters.name: post_parent

parameters.description: Filter events with or without tickets.
parameters.name: ticketed

201.description: Returns successful checking of the find event archive.

400.description: A required parameter is missing or an input parameter is in the wrong format.

parameters.description: The access token to authorize Zapier connection.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: The page of results to return; defaults to 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: How many attendees to return per results page; defaults to posts_per_page.
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees whose ticket is provided by one of the providers specified in the CSV list or array; defaults to all the available.
parameters.name: provider

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees containing the specified string in the title or description.
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Offset the results by a specific number of items.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Sort results in ASC or DESC order. Defaults to ASC.
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: Order the results by one of date, relevance, id, include, title or slug. Defaults to id.
parameters.name: orderby

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees by post the ticket is associated with.
parameters.name: post_id

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees associated with a ticket.
parameters.name: ticket_id

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees created after or on the specified UTC date or timestamp.
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees created before or on the specified UTC date or timestamp.
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: Limit results to a specific CSV list or array of attendee IDs.
parameters.name: include

parameters.description: Exclude a specific CSV list or array of attendee IDs from the results.
parameters.name: exclude

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees that paid tickets a price equal or below the specified value; if not specified no maximum price limit will be used.
parameters.name: price_max

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees that paid tickets a price equal or above the specified value; if not specified no minimum price limit will be used.
parameters.name: price_min

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees whose ticket is assigned to one of the posts specified in the CSV list or array.
parameters.name: include_post

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees whose tickets is not assigned to any of the posts specified in the CSV list or array..
parameters.name: exclude_post

parameters.description: Limit results to a specific CSV list or array of ticket IDs.
parameters.name: include_ticket

parameters.description: Exclude a specific CSV list or array of ticket IDs.
parameters.name: exclude_ticket

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees for posts that are in one of the post statuses specified in the CSV list or array; defaults to publish.
parameters.name: post_status

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees that are in one of post statuses specified in the CSV list or array; defaults to publish.
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees whose order status is in one of post statuses specified in the CSV list or array; defaults to public.
parameters.name: order_status

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees that are or not checked-in.
parameters.name: checkedin

parameters.description: Limit results to RSVP Attendees that have one of the RSVP Going status specified in the CSV list or array.
parameters.name: rsvp_going_status

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees for tickets that provide attendees the possibility to fill in additional information or not; requires ET+.
parameters.name: attendee_information_available

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees by name. It will search for names that are like the specified value
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Limit results to attendees by email. It will search for emails that are like the specified value
parameters.name: email

201.description: Returns successful checking of the find attendee archive.

400.description: A required parameter is missing or an input parameter is in the wrong format.

parameters.description: The access token to authorize Zapier connection.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: The page of results to return; defaults to 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: How many tickets to return per results page; defaults to posts_per_page.
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets containing the specified string in the title or description.
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Offset the results by a specific number of items.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Sort results in ASC or DESC order. Defaults to ASC.
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: Order the results by one of date, relevance, id, include, title, or slug; defaults to title.
parameters.name: orderby

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that have or do not have capacity currently available.
parameters.name: is_available

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets provided by one of the providers specified in the CSV list or array; defaults to all available.
parameters.name: provider

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets created after or on the specified UTC date or timestamp.
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets created before or on the specified UTC date or timestamp.
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: Limit results to a specific CSV list or array of ticket IDs.
parameters.name: include

parameters.description: Exclude a specific CSV list or array of ticket IDs from the results.
parameters.name: exclude

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that are assigned to one of the posts specified in the CSV list or array.
parameters.name: include_post

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that are not assigned to any of the posts specified in the CSV list or array.
parameters.name: exclude_post

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that have at least this number or attendees.
parameters.name: attendees_min

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that have at most this number of attendees.
parameters.name: attendees_max

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that have at most this number of checked-in attendee.
parameters.name: checkedin_min

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that have at least this number of checked-in attendees.
parameters.name: checkedin_max

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that have at least this capacity.
parameters.name: capacity_min

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that have at most this capacity.
parameters.name: capacity_max

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that will be available at or after the specified UTC date (parseable by strtotime) or timestamp.
parameters.name: available_from

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that will be available up to the specified UTC date (parseable by strtotime) or timestamp.
parameters.name: available_until

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets assigned to posts that are in one of the post statuses specified in the CSV list or array; defaults to publish.
parameters.name: post_status

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that are in one of post statuses specified in the CSV list or array; defaults to publish.
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets priced in one of the 3-letter currency codes specified in the CSV list or array.
parameters.name: currency

parameters.description: Limit results to tickets that provide attendees the possibility to fill in additional information or not; requires ET+.
parameters.name: attendee_information_available

201.description: Returns successful checking of the find ticket archive.

400.description: A required parameter is missing or an input parameter is in the wrong format.
